data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Tondela.
Rio Ave are caught offside.
Free kick Rio Ave.
In the minute 4, Rio Ave's Aderllan Santos breaks free at Estadio Joao Cardoso. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Tondela goal kick.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 6, Tondela are pushing forward but Joao Pedro's finish is wide of the goal.
Rio Ave have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 8, Ball safe as Tondela is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tondela awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tondela to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Tondela.
Goal! Ricardo Alves heads Tondela into a 1-0 lead.
Great play from Salvador Agra to set up the goal.
In the minute 11, Rui Costa signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Tondela's half.
In Tondela a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tondela needs to be cautious. Rio Ave have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 14, Nikola Jambor of Rio Ave gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Tondela in the half of Rio Ave.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Rio Ave.
In the minute 17, It's a goal kick for the home team in Tondela.
Can Tondela capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rio Ave's half?
Pedro Augusto (Tondela) fires in a shot â€“ and hits the post!
In the minute 20, Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
Throw-in Rio Ave.
Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 21, Rui Costa awards Tondela a goal kick.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
In the minute 22, Rui Costa signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Tondela's half.
Free kick for Tondela in their own half.
Throw-in Rio Ave.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Tondela.
Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, Tondela will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Rio Ave.
Rio Ave apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Lucas Piazon. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
Aderllan Santos of Rio Ave smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 31, Rui Costa signals a Tondela throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
In Tondela a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Tondela close to the penalty box.
In the minute 34, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Rio Ave in Tondela.
Free kick Rio Ave.
In the minute 36, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The match at Estadio Joao Cardoso has been interrupted briefly for a check on Gelson Dala, who is down injured.
Gelson Dala is back on his feet again.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In Tondela a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 40, Rui Costa signals a throw-in for Tondela, close to Rio Ave's area.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Rio Ave.
Tondela to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
In the minute 42, Tondela have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Rio Ave goal kick.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
The second-half is underway in Tondela.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
The away team replace Lucas Piazon with Bruno Moreira.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Rio Ave.
Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Rio Ave needs to be cautious. Tondela have an attacking throw-in.
Rui Costa signals a throw-in for Tondela, close to Rio Ave's area.
In the minute 51, Rio Ave's Bruno Moreira gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tondela defender.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
In Tondela Rio Ave attack through Carlos Mane. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 53, Goal kick for Tondela at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Rui Costa signals a Tondela throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
In the minute 54, Tondela to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Tondela territory.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tondela's half?
In the minute 56, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Attention is being given to Rio Aveâ€™s Gelson Dala and play has been suspended briefly.
Gelson Dala returns to the field for Rio Ave after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 59, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Rio Ave just outside Tondela's area.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Can Rio Ave capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Tondela's half?
In the minute 61, Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Rio Ave close to the penalty box.
Diego Lopes for Rio Ave drives towards goal at Estadio Joao Cardoso. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 63, Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Rui Costa.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Tondela.
In the minute 65, Rui Costa signals a Tondela throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
Throw-in Rio Ave.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the home team in Tondela.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Salvador Agra for Tondela who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Rui Costa awards Rio Ave a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Salvador Agra, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Rafael Barbosa is the substitute for Tondela.
Tondela awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 73, Tondela's Rafael Barbosa is on target but unsuccessful.
Rui Costa awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Gabrielzinho is replacing Gelson Dala for the away team.
In the minute 74, Rio Ave make their third substitution with Chico Geraldes replacing Nelson Monte.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Tondela in their own half.
In the minute 76, Pako Ayestaran is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Joao Cardoso with Tiago replacing Bebeto.
Rui Costa signals a Tondela throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
Throw-in Rio Ave.
In the minute 77, Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Tondela in their own half.
Diego Lopes (Rio Ave) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bruno Moreira for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 80, Tondela to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
Can Tondela get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 82, Bruno Moreira gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rio Ave.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Bruno Moreira (Rio Ave) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 84, Rui Costa signals a free kick to Tondela.
Jota is on a sub for Joao Pedro for Tondela.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, Ryotaro Meshino is replacing Tarantini for Rio Ave at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Free kick for Tondela in the half of Rio Ave.
Throw-in for Tondela in the half of Rio Ave.
In the minute 88, Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
Tomislav Strkalj (Tondela) has received a yellow card from Rui Costa.
Rui Costa signals a free kick to Tondela.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
Tondela's Joao Jaquite misses with an attempt on goal.
Rio Ave have a goal kick.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Joao Jaquite has recovered and rejoins the match in Tondela.
Tondela are coming forward and Rafael Barbosa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Rui Costa awards Rio Ave a goal kick.
Rui Costa awards the away team a throw-in.
Ryotaro Meshino (Rio Ave) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Tondela, Filipe Ferreira of Tondela is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Rui Costa waits before resuming play because Joao Jaquite for Tondela is still down.
Ryotaro Meshino grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Estadio Joao Cardoso.
That's a fine assist from Chico Geraldes.
